articles.title: In Longevity Game, Most Americans Have It All Wrong, Doctor Says - Athletech News
articles.description: Levels co-founder Dr. Casey Means advocates for an approach to metabolic health that emphasizes foundational habits over wellness gadgets.
articles.content:
Six in 10 Americans have a chronic illness. 74% of Americans are overweight or obese, and according to at least one estimate, 93% of American adults are dealing with metabolic health dysfunction.
